artifacts.summary: Complete worklist algorithm design for seed construction with termination proof strategy, consistency invariants, closure properties, and cross-sign coherence resolution

partial_progress.details: Designed complete worklist-based seed construction algorithm with: (1) WorkItem/WorklistState data structures, (2) processWorkItem for each formula class, (3) termination measure via lexicographic (complexity sum, worklist length), (4) consistency invariant preservation, (5) closure property proofs (ModalClosed, GClosed, HClosed), (6) cross-sign coherence resolution via explicit propagation

findings.termination_measure: Lexicographic pair: (sum of unprocessed formula complexities, worklist length)
findings.key_insight: Formula complexity strictly decreases with each recursion; positions bounded by subformula count
findings.consistency_strategy: Witness creation produces trivially consistent singletons; universal propagation preserves consistency via T/4 axioms
closure_properties: ModalClosed: Box psi → psi at all families
GClosed: G psi → psi at all future times in seed
HClosed: H psi → psi at all past times in seed
findings.cross_sign_resolution: Worklist processes H psi at future times created by G(H psi), explicitly placing psi at past times including origin

recommendations: Implement processWorkItem with pattern matching on FormulaClass
Prove termination via formula complexity decrease
Connect to SeedCompletion.lean to resolve 5 sorries
